programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel says a fond farewell to the team with his final edition of the programme. In this special show he takes a fond look back on the 200 episodes he has hosted, meeting up with specialists and revealing surprising updates on some of the most exciting objects featured during his eight years with the series.

programme.title: Michael Aspel at the BBC
programme.desc: Before he became one of Britains best-loved presenters, Michael Aspel was the face of early television - donning the famous communal dinner jacket as a continuity announcer in the fledgling days of broadcasting. In this warm and revealing documentary, Aspel looks back on a career that spanned news reading, childrens favourites like Crackerjack and Ask Aspel and iconic shows including This Is Your Life and Antiques Roadshow.

programme.title: Ask Aspel with Kate Bush
programme.desc: Michael Aspel presents an episode of the childrens request show, first broadcast in 1978 and featuring guest Kate Bush, who performs Cashca from Baghdad.

programme.title: This Is Your Life
programme.desc: Michael Aspel springs a surprise on one of the biggest names in show business, actor and comedian Bob Hope. Among the guests sharing their memories are Phyllis Diller, Milton Berle, Jane Russell, Carroll Baker, Arnold Palmer and President Gerald Ford.

programme.title: Personal Cinema: Maggie Smith
programme.desc: In a programme first broadcast in 1970, Maggie Smith talks to Michael Aspel about her career and chooses scenes from some of her favourite films, including Way Out West, The Last Hurrah, On the Waterfront, Some Like It Hot and The Prime of Miss Jean Brody.

programme.title: Michael Aspel Remembers... The Evacuees
programme.desc: Michael Aspel, now 92, reflects on his childhood as an evacuee during the Second World War. Sent to Chard in Somerset at the age of seven, he was separated from his siblings and didnt see his parents for over four years. In this candid recollection, Aspel shares vivid memories of adapting to rural life, clashes with local children and the lasting impact of those formative years - stories he first touched on in the 1969 documentary The Evacuees.

programme.title: The Evacuees
programme.desc: During the Second World War thousands of children were evacuated from Belfast, separated from their families and their familiar streets to live with strangers in the countryside. This poignant documentary reveals the remarkable untold stories of the evacuees.

programme.title: What We Were Watching
programme.desc: Grace Dent embarks on a televisual trip back in time by setting the remote control for December 1995 and serving up an irreverent look back at the festive viewing options that faced the nation in the past.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel says a fond farewell to the team with his final edition of the programme. programme.title: Michael Aspel at the BBC
programme.desc: Before he became one of Britains best-loved presenters, Michael Aspel was the face of early television - donning the famous communal dinner jacket as a continuity announcer in the fledgling days of broadcasting. In this warm and revealing documentary, Aspel looks back on a career that spanned news reading, childrens favourites like Crackerjack and Ask Aspel and iconic shows including This Is Your Life and Antiques Roadshow.

programme.title: Ask Aspel with Kate Bush
programme.desc: Michael Aspel presents an episode of the childrens request show, first broadcast in 1978 and featuring guest Kate Bush, who performs Cashca from Baghdad.

programme.title: This Is Your Life
programme.desc: Michael Aspel springs a surprise on one of the biggest names in show business, actor and comedian Bob Hope. Among the guests sharing their memories are Phyllis Diller, Milton Berle, Jane Russell, Carroll Baker, Arnold Palmer and President Gerald Ford.

programme.title: Personal Cinema: Maggie Smith
programme.desc: In a programme first broadcast in 1970, Maggie Smith talks to Michael Aspel about her career and chooses scenes from some of her favourite films, including Way Out West, The Last Hurrah, On the Waterfront, Some Like It Hot and The Prime of Miss Jean Brody.

programme.title: What We Were Watching
programme.desc: Grace Dent embarks on a televisual trip back in time by setting the remote control for December 1995 and serving up an irreverent look back at the festive viewing options that faced the nation in the past.

programme.title: My Life at Christmas with Anita Rani
programme.desc: Anita Rani meets Paralympian and broadcaster Ade Adepitan to hear his inspirational life story and how sport, spirituality and the festive season have shaped him. Anita discovers his life-affirming Christmas story, from contracting polio as a toddler in Nigeria, to growing up with a disability in east London in the 1970s, to the rocky road that led to Paralympic glory with the British wheelchair basketball team. Now a respected broadcaster, Ade shines a light on causes close to his heart.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.sub-title: Palpung Changchub Dargyeling Buddhist Temple, Brynmawr
programme.desc: Prayer and Reflection from the Tibetan Buddhist temple in Brynmawr.

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: A week before Christmas Day, Claire McCollum visits a very festive Hever Castle in Kent. Advent is a time of preparation for the coming of Christ, and Claire shares the joy and excitement of the season with the local community. She hears about the history of Anne Boleyns childhood spent at the castle, then joins the local school for their annual Christingle service.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Following the work of different charities and highlighting ways of supporting their activities. Featuring different ways to raise money, as well as awareness for a wide range of causes.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programmes photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A look at the toys people love and how theyve shaped childhood, including some of the best loved toys of the past 100 years, from teddy bears and Sindy dolls to Star Wars action figures and computer games. From a 4,000-year-old pull-along toy to one of the first personal computer consoles based on the arcade game Pac Man, the team explore how toys and the ideas of childhood have changed over time. Fiona also meets broadcaster Jonathan Ross, owner of one of the largest toy collections in the UK.

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Meet the people that made filming Kingdom possible and uncover the extraordinary acts of conservationists and anti-poaching teams protecting South Luangwa and all its inhabitants.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: The Glitterball trophy is now within touching distance. The remaining couples nervously wait to find out who has secured a place in the grand final. Kylie Minogue joins our professionals for a very special group performance, and theres music from Five. Two couples will face the agony of the final dance-off of the series, where the prize is a coveted spot in the Strictly final. Who will make it through and get the chance to compete to be your champion?

programme.title: The War Between the Land and the Sea
programme.desc: When a fearsome and ancient species emerges from the ocean, dramatically revealing themselves to humanity, an international crisis is triggered. With the entire population at risk, UNIT step into action as the land and sea wage war.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: Its time to deck the halls because Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are heading back to Longleat Safari Park for a magical week of programmes. It wouldnt be Christmas without mistletoe and a hint of romance, and thats exactly what the keepers are hoping for at the cheetah enclosure. Rachael is the stunning female looking for a mate, and she has two boys to choose from, brothers Mo and Bolt.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui looks at a two-bed bungalow in Lowestoft, Tommy goes to see a three-bed mid-terraced cottage in the hamlet of Verney Junction, and the team return to Gorleston-on-Sea in Norfolk to catch up with two brothers tackling a Victorian building.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Santa sends his naughty helper Elfred to join Danny Sebastian in presenting this fabulously festive episode of the show. Ho-ho-hoping to unwrap plenty of profits are two teams of Christmas shoppers, and gifting their expert knowledge are Roo Irvine and Caroline Hawley. In red are in-laws Gary and Riah. Sisters Claire and Jill are in blue. With £300 in their pockets, the teams scour the stalls of Newark antiques fair searching for bargains to sell at auction.

programme.desc: Its Christmas at Button House and Mike and Alison are heading to Mikes parents to celebrate with family. As Mike piles up the Tupperware with what he insists are only side dishes, despite one clearly being an entire turkey, Kitty expresses her disappointment at not spending Christmas day with Alison. Alison promises that theyll be back by the evening and whats more, reveals to the ghosts that there is a Christmas surprise for each of them in the library.

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: Today, things take a sweet turn, as pastry skills and spectacular creations come to the fore. Nobody should get too comfy, as one more will be heading home. Finals week kicks off with a trip to one of the countrys most celebrated potteries, Wedgwood, which is celebrating the 250th anniversary of its most famous clay creations - Jasperware. The celebrities will be serving a delectable afternoon tea for some special guests, including renowned potters and the Lord Mayor of Stoke-on-Trent.

programme.desc: Mike tries to teach James fiscal responsibility, and an action figure of the mayor proves to be too much of a good thing.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Heidi tries to rekindle her romance with Mike when the mayor hires her to help publicise his animal rights campaign.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Nikki is led to believe Mike will leave her for Heidi Klum, and the mayor doesnt realise Janelle wants to break up with him.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike has trouble finding a campaign manager for the mayors senatorial bid until Caitlin Moore comes in for an interview.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray receives a large blow to his ego when Andy sells an article to `Sports Illustrated.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Nobody likes Raymond after his negative comments about marriage lead to the break-up of Robert and Amy.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and his family are crushed when Marie cooks up a tofu turkey for Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Debra, beautiful neighbours are the real reasons that Ray is spending so much time at Roberts apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: In the second episode showing what could have happened to the friends had their lives taken different paths, Carol and Ross decide to have a threesome to spice up their marriage, while Rachel goes to Joeys and kisses him and then catches Barry cheating.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler gets into trouble with his homemade gift for Monica, Ross tries to teach martial arts to Rachel and Phoebe, and Joey hires a look-alike.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Meanwhile, Ross gets into trouble at work, and Chandler tries to help Joeys career.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student girlfriend Liz goes on holiday with her wild friends. Meanwhile, Rachel is desperate to find a date for a charity ball, and Joeys fridge breaks down.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
programme.desc: Joey is excited about his audition for a major television action series about a man and his crimefighting robot, but Chandler almost ruins everything.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeths Dad
programme.desc: Ross fails to impress his girlfriends father who proves tricky to get on with, and Phoebe makes Chandler and Monica paranoid by chronicling their every move in a supposedly fictional book she is writing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Pauls the Man
programme.desc: Ross accidentally takes Elizabeth to the same cabin where Elizabeths strict father takes Rachel for a romantic vacation, and Monica panics Chandler by planning their wedding.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Since she is the only one who knows that Chandler plans to ask Monica to marry him, Phoebe helps Chandler shop for a wedding ring, while Rachels wish for Paul to reveal his emotions creates a new set of problems.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers romantic marriage proposal is ruined when Monicas former boyfriend returns, Joey accidentally buys a boat, and a dormitory incident reminds Ross how young his girlfriend is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica is left reeling from Richards declaration that he loves her and wants to marry her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is toasting Chandler and Monicas engagement, but after Chandler fails to come up with the goods in the bedroom, he begins to worry about the consequences. Elsewhere, Monica thinks Rachel is trying to steal her glory when she catches her kissing Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monicas dream of a fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile, Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers desperate effort to bond with Monicas dad by playing racquetball backfires when he accidentally gets too up-close-and-personal. Elsewhere, Rachel tries to teach `landlubber Joey how to sail without falling overboard, while Monica seeks to replicate Phoebes late grandmothers secret recipe by deconstructing her last remaining cookie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel must hire an assistant and agonises over whether to hire an efficient, experienced woman, or sexy young Tag Jones. Ignoring her friends advice, she hires Tag and soon regrets it. To make matters worse, Tag is attracted to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Engagement Picture
programme.desc: While taking an engagement picture for himself and Monica, Chandler cant stop pulling a strange face, Rachel enlists Joey to take Tag out for a night on the town, and Phoebe and Ross date a couple in the middle of a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Nap Partners
programme.desc: Wedding fever continues when Monica cant decide whether to appoint Rachel or Phoebe as her maid of honour. To help Monica decide, Joey and Ross test them on how they would react in certain wedding situations.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Radioactive Revenge and a Ruined Christmas
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix have potential a******s aplenty, including a flatmate who uses radioactive material to get her way and a woman obsessed with STI checks.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: For the penultimate leg of their journey Bradley and Barney head to Italy, starting by the picturesque Lake Garda, where Barney surprises his dad by explaining they will be running off the top of Monte Baldo and paragliding over the lake below. Soon after, Bradley takes a dip in the lake when he tries paddleboard yoga. The next day the guys travel to the River Po for a boat trip like no other, as Bradley is treated to a hair-raising ride in a Formula 1 speed boat.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Barney and Bradley Walsh embark on the final leg of their European road trip, as they continue to explore Italy. Having reached Rome, they take a trip back in time to battle it out as gladiators. They continue south and make a stop to soak up the views from a sky high zipwire. As the boys reach their final stop on the Amalfi Coast, they get the chance to swim in the stunning sea, but theyll have to cliff dive in first.

programme.title: Rhod Gilberts Growing Pains
programme.desc: Rhod is joined by Mel B, Jo Brand and Alex Jones, competing for the cringiest teens. Discover whose mum appears to dish the dirt on someones teen antics.

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Christmas In London
programme.desc: The celebrated violinist and conductor Andre Rieu performs in London, where he and his orchestra perform Christmas carols and other favourites including Leonard Cohens `Hallelujah.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Miracle on 4th Street: The concept of Miracle on 4th Street, asks a simple question. What would happen if Santa Claus strolled into New York in the lead-up to Christmas?

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Love Actually: Nine separate tales are woven together to create a cross-section of life, ranging from the zany to the uplifting to the heartbreaking.

programme.title: Bob Marley and the Wailers: The Capitol Session 73

programme.title: Classic Albums
programme.sub-title: Bob Marley and the Wailers: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: We take a look at Bob Marley and The Wailers classic album, `Catch A Fire. With interviews with all the key players, we build a picture of how the album was conceived, produced and recorded.

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: Leading music critics cast fresh light on the career of award-winning American singer-songwriter Paul Simon, whose fame, influence and success began as part of duo Simon and Garfunkel.

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the life and career of James Brown. Dubbed the Godfather of Soul, he was one of the most iconic figures in music up until his death in 2006.

programme.title: Discovering Music
programme.desc: Music journalists examine the life and music of Stevie Wonder, the iconic figure whose hits include You Are the Sunshine of My Life and Superstition.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: The mysterious murder weapon used to kill a young policeman cant be found.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: Billys new landlady is kind and friendly, but he cant help feeling uneasy about the place, particularly as the last two guests signed in over two years ago and no one has stayed there since.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Lady Turton flaunts her lovers in front of her husband, but the disapproving butler sees the perfect chance for revenge.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A young couples lives are strangely altered when the wife becomes obsessed with a stray cat.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A tourist on a transatlantic liner stakes his all on one last, desperate gamble.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A deranged woman kidnaps a 7-month-old boy who she believes is her son while renting a room at a womans farmhouse.

programme.desc: In this 1981 concert, the folk rock legend performs his greatest hits, including `Annies Song, `Calypso and `Sunshine on my Shoulders.

programme.desc: Alan Cumming (The Good Wife) embarks on a tour of the UK, uncovering the secrets of some of Britains cities. Beginning in London, he travels from St Pauls Cathedral to Soho.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations and decides to reminisce about past race days instead.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: The locals decide to raise £150,000 for a memorial commemorating fishermen lost at sea. Plus, Pat considers taking part in a skydive, and the search for scallops begins.

programme.desc: Tyrion and the Lannisters fight for their lives as Stannis fleet attacks Kings Landing.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theon incites his men to action; Luwin offers advice; Brienne silences Jaime; Arya receives a gift; Dany goes to a strange place; Jon proves himself.

programme.desc: Tyrion gains new responsibilities; Jon is taken to the Fist of the First Men; Daenerys meets with the slavers; Jaime strikes a deal with his captors.

programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods; Jaime is judged; Jon proves himself; Robb is betrayed; Tyrion learns the cost of weddings.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: During a tour of Italy, two friends enjoy sumptuous meals and lively conversations about such eclectic topics as Batmans vocal range.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock is trying to take down Carlton Drake, the notorious and brilliant founder of the Life Foundation. While investigating one of Drakes experiments, Eddies body merges with the alien Venom -- leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Eddie Brock is still struggling to coexist with the shape-shifting extraterrestrial Venom. When deranged serial killer Cletus Kasady also becomes host to an alien symbiote, Brock and Venom must put aside their differences to stop his reign of terror.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Rebellious
programme.desc: A headstrong princess is stolen by an evil sorcerer, and her scholarly fiance must use his wits in an epic quest to find her while she boldly challenges her captors and plots a daring escape.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Open Season: Scared Silly
programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.desc: The humans and animals believe a werewolf is on the loose, so former hunter Shaw uses the opportunity to re-open the season. Boog, Elliot, and Mr Weenie have to face their fears and find the werewolf to get the season closed permanently.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Disgraced FBI agents Marcus and Kevin go to bizarre lengths to catch a devious millionaire. They disguise themselves as dumb white socialites Brittany and Tiffany Wilson, the heiresses to a hotel fortune who are under threat. Gross-out comedic farce from the makers of `Scary Movie.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: A woman drags her skeptical husband to a renowned counsellors marriage retreat to try to put the spark back in their relationship.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A reluctant bare-knuckle boxer and his manager brother must travel across the country for one last fight, but an unexpected travel companion exposes the cracks in their bond along the way.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Parallel coming-of-age stories of a layabout `serial nice guy living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased fathers fortune, and a bright but awkward youth whos tired of his mothers depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when the boy fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together).

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a sex worker from Brooklyn, gets her chance at a Cinderella story when she meets and marries the son of an oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairytale is threatened as the parents set out for New York to get the marriage annulled.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: After moving to China, twelve-year-old Dre Parker falls in love with his classmate Mei Ying. This soon comes to the attention of the class bully, Cheng.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A new kid at a school makes the mistake of dating the ex-girlfriend of the school bully, whose gang then make his life a misery. He then bumps into a handyman who also happens to be a karate master. The handyman teaches him martial arts and he eventually meets up with his tormentors at a tournament, but will they fight fair?

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Old rivalries and new adversaries await Daniel and Miyagi as they travel to Okinawa to visit Miyagis ailing father.

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: A boy trained in the martial arts is alienated from his mentor just when he needs to prepare for a showdown with his arch-enemy. Instead, he turns to a Vietnam vet who teaches him how to fight dirty - a strategy the youth comes to realise is a mistake.

programme.title: The Next Karate Kid
programme.desc: Martial arts master Miyagi has an uphill battle on his hands when he takes a troubled girl as his latest apprentice.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Released from jail, Lang returns to his hometown in Northwest China. As part of a dog patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, he bonds with a black stray. The two lonely souls embark on a new journey together.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A lay preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Competing teams of storm chasers find themselves in a fight for their lives as multiple systems converge over central Oklahoma.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1
programme.desc: In 1859 families discover the lure of the Old West as they settle in territories from Wyoming to Kansas. Meanwhile, a gruff cowboy soon finds himself on the run with a prostitute and a young boy after killing a fellow gunman.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns hes capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Released from jail, Lang returns to his hometown in Northwest China. As part of a dog patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, he bonds with a black stray. The two lonely souls embark on a new journey together.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A lay preachers violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A young writer travels to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by a cult of sycophants and intoxicated journalists, she soon finds herself in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: Mickey 17

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In England 2027, worldwide infertility has left the population on the brink of extinction and all hope of a cure is lost. However, underground activist Julian shows up with a miraculously pregnant girl.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: Two army buddies who have become entertainers travel to a Vermont ski resort for a well-earned rest. However, on arrival they find the resort - run by their old army commander - in need of a helping hand. Theres only one answer - put on a show.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Santa gives a successful businessman 12 chances to relive the same day so he can repair his damaged relationships with his loved ones.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Sharp Corner
programme.desc: A dedicated family man becomes obsessed with saving the lives of the car accident victims on the sharp corner in front of his house - an obsession that could cost him everything.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When his beloved wife, Kathryn, is suspected of betraying the nation, intelligence agent George Woodhouse faces the ultimate test -- loyalty to his marriage or his country.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise theyre at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed Christmas special looking at how the police respond to street crime. In Peterborough, an office party ends in a fight involving ten people, and police intervene to stop a brawl outside a club. In Leicester, a drunk driver is apprehended after being spotted on CCTV, and in Barrow a very drunk man has to be taken home after he soils himself in a minicab office.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: A series of action-packed Christmas specials looking at how the police respond to street crime. In Colwyn Bay, a man is fined for urinating on a Christmas tree, and a fight in Leicester city centre ends in one man being arrested. In Peterborough, a drunk man found covered in blood admits to having taken heroin, and a police officer is attacked while attending an incident outside a nightclub.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: While Watson and the team help a woman whose memory resets every three minutes, Watson struggles with auditory hallucinations and questions whether someone is behind his current decline; Moriarty plots his next move.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Watson runs into an old friend of Sherlock Holmes when her son Angus is admitted to UHOP for temporary paralysis; the fellows help Watson after he grows fond of Angus, pursuing various leads to find a cure to his illness.

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Officer Nolan tries to reunite a family, while Officer Harpers past resurfaces and threatens to jeopardise an overnight visit with her daughter.

programme.title: Law and Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Detectives Logan and Barek probe the deaths of two sisters who suffocated after being paralysed and wrapped in plastic. Their investigation leads to a nurse-turned-voodoo healer who may have placed a curse on Logan.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted

programme.title: PK
programme.desc: A stranger in the city asks questions no one has asked before. Known only by his initials, P.K.s innocent questions and childlike curiosity take him on a journey of love, laughter and letting go.

programme.title: Heyy Baby

Now Del Boy and family have only two weeks to find some cash or they will be evicted from Nelson Mandela House. To cap it all, Cassandra is about to give birth and Trigger is behaving even more oddly than usual.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Things have gone so well for the Trotters that Del and Rodney decide to treat Uncle Albert to a surprise birthday party. And Rodney has a night on the town with a date, but things dont quite go according to plan.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Del, Rodney and Uncle Albert take their mates from the Nags Head on a disastrous day trip to Margate. A worried Cassandra is none too happy at Rodney joining the party having just celebrated their first anniversary.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Things are moving on for the Trotter family as Del is now a dad, and Rodney is back with Cassandra. However, Del is down in the yuletide dumps with money problems, and Rodders worries his `bruv has lost his drive.

programme.title: The Vicar of Dibley
programme.desc: At last the Vicar will attend a wedding in a dress not a dog collar. Or will she? Unfortunately the vicar Geraldine has chosen for the service seems a bit too fond of her. The villagers have waited until now to suggest their worst two ideas ever - a skydiving wedding and something far, far worse.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Agnes Brown has had enough hassle with Christmas trees to last a lifetime, so this year she refuses to have one. However, with Grandads health a worry for everyone, is there something else missing this Christmas apart from just the tree?

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: Christmas festivities take an unexpected turn when Spudgun and Hedgehog turn up for dinner and Richie discovers a baby on the doorstep.

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Tension mounts in the Royle household as the family contemplates the prospect of becoming fully laminated throughout. Dr Mahmoud prescribes new medication for Nana in the form of yellow tablets; coincidentally they turn out to be the same colour as the tablets that Joe was prescribed for the swelling when he got his bits stuck in his zip. Meanwhile, a mysterious ginger visitor reminds Nana of her favourite musical.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Private Lives
programme.desc: Dr Tracy Borman reveals how Peter the Greats unconventional childhood produced a very unconventional man capable of dragging Russia towards the modern age.

programme.title: Private Lives
programme.desc: Tracy Borman heads to Chicago to discover how Al Capone rose to infamy, from club bouncer to the most notorious gangster in history, uncovering the two sides to his personality.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred shifts his attention to the development of the iron and steel industries, starting with Ironbridge Gorge in Shropshire. He comes across a rolling mill which he remembers once operating in Bolton, tries his hand at chain making, and then its eyes-on-stalks time as Fred drives the biggest steam rolling mill engine he has ever seen.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Starting in Cornwall and travelling all the way to Scotland, Fred turns his eye to the practice of mining. On his travels, he finds out exactly how tin, slate, lead and coal were all extracted from the ground.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Freds fascinating journey through Britains industrial past sees him tracing the development of the railways, from the first steam locomotive to the record-breaking Mallard. The excitement reminds him of his childhood days when locomotives used to roar past his bedroom window, and Fred gets his hands dirty stoking the boiler of a Black Five as he speeds through the Welsh countryside.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred moves on to the golden age of shipbuilding, examining the skills of engineers who turned Britain into one of the foremost manufacturing nations. He also visits the worlds first production line in Suffolk.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: Fred visits Cornwall to look at the early history of the steam engine, first developed to pump water from tin mines.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.sub-title: The Age of the Steam Locomotive
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah tells the story of the revolution in transport brought about by steam power, from the earliest colliery railways to the end of steam operation on Britains rail network in the 1960s.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at the extraordinary expansion of industrial Britain in the 18th century, and at the continued use of huge stationary steam engines in mills, collieries and steel works until the 20th century.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah looks at early experiments in the use of steam for road transport, and at the development of the traction engine for use in agriculture and road haulage.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at how steam revolutionised shipping, from the earliest paddle steamers with screw propellers to more modern vessels like the Royal Yacht Britannia.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: A look at the major advances made with the invention of the steam turbine, still used today to generate electricity in coal-fired and nuclear power stations, and Britains steam heritage.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek picks out a solid-looking 1969 MGB for the team to look out for at auction. After winning it is sent to a father-and-son team to restore.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Dave alerts the team to a 1979 Lotus Esprit S3. The car is a thoroughbred classic that desperately needs a proper restoration, but its also an expensive purchase that risks not paying off.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at carnivores, from arctic foxes who store up food for the winter, through pack-hunting wolves, to big cats. Using infrared, he trails a lone leopard, and seeks out the biggest cat of all, the Siberian tiger.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: Omnivores resourcefulness enables them to take advantage of gluts of certain kinds of foods, and helps them to survive. Featuring raccoons with their sensitive hands, and bears that gorge while the salmon are running up river, before hibernating through winter.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: In Florida, David swims for the first time with manatees - gentle, giant grazing mammals. Off the coast of California, he dons a wet suit and flippers to swim with sea otters, and, in a tiny boat, he encounters the biggest mammal of all, a blue whale.

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: We study tree dwellers - mammals which have adapted to a life at height. A third of the worlds surface is still covered by forest of some sort. Animals such as the hyrax, tamanduas and flying squirrel have developed different tactics with which to exploit this environment.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: In the Taurus Mountains Simon stays with descendants of the original Turks, nomads known as Yoruks, whose lifestyle is under threat from the amodern world and an increasingly Islamic government.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson sets out on one of the worlds most iconic pilgrimages, the Camino de Santiago, in search of what makes this journey so meaningful to so many.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will Trickett and Gus Gregory hunt for neglected cars they can fix and flip for a profit. Any losses incurred by their flipping come out of their own pockets.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads north to pick up a 1954 Morgan +4 coupe in mint condition and believed to be just one of three still on the road.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek takes a shine to a rare 1958 Armstrong Siddeley Sapphire with a long family history and a convertible Triumph Herald brings a few smiles on auction day.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: An Aston Martin DB6 in need of total restoration looks set to break the Mathewsons auction record and news of a rare Vincent motorbike arriving causes a stir.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek picks up some emerging sporting classics from the far east when three Datsun Zs appear, and an unusual lot arrives that run on caterpillar tracks not wheels.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Theres real Yorkshire drama when Derek auctions off some vehicles that were used in the TV show Heartbeat. Theres love for an Austin Cambridge and sporty Italian number finds a new home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Explorer Paul Rose digs out his rucksack and heads for Windermere. The National Park attracts 18 million visitors each year, and is now a World Heritage Site. Paul joins the crowds and finds out why the early tourists thought the Lakes was one of the most dangerous spots in the country. He also plunges into the world of long-distance swimming and helps the staff who run the boats on the lake.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Explorer Paul Rose packs his waterproofs and heads for Derwentwater and Borrowdale. Borrowdale is officially the wettest place in England, and he meets those who have battled against flooding and have learned to live with extreme weather events. Along the way, he tells the story of Millican Dalton, the Professor of Adventure, who ran his own expeditions in the Lake District more than 70 years ago. Paul also heads for the summit of Great Gable, one of the Lakes best known peaks.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Paul Rose has as adrenaline overdose on his way to Coniston, beginning with entering a retro cycling event on a penny farthing before joining the mountain bikers of Grizedale Forest. Paul also relives the final moments of Donald Campbell in his attempt to break the world water speed record on Coniston Water, and ends his trek with a spot of rock climbing at Dow Crag before the ascent of one of the areas best known hills: The Old Man of Coniston.

programme.title: The Lakes with Paul Rose
programme.desc: Remote Eskdale is the final destination in explorer Paul Roses trek through the Lake District. This corner of the western Lakes is off the normal tourist track but it boasts Englands highest mountain. Before heading for the tough Lakeland summit of Scafell Pike, Paul meets the folk who run one of the countrys most scenic railways, he has a close encounter with a vulture, and gets to grips with the locals in a spot of Cumberland wrestling.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1968 Honda N600 car emerges from a lock-up in County Durham and Derek travels Scotland to collect an original RAC Bedford van.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business, which uncovers some remarkably rare vehicles in Thornton-le-Dale. The Mathwesons attract all kinds of classic car buyers from all over the country.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear how an assassination brought conflict to Europe in 1914.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: This location is a first, with the show being recorded inside an active air base at Marham in Norfolk, home to the RAFs longest-serving squadron as it celebrates its centenary year. Objects brought in include a gold cup boasting a handsome history as well as a stunning valuation, a poignant book depicting the hard life of a Victorian orphan.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team visit Port Sunlight on the Wirral for another busy day of valuations. Treasures under scrutiny include a portrait of Shakespeare discovered beneath another painting, a model of Buckingham Palace made from thousands of matchsticks, and one of the most exciting pieces of jewellery seen on the show.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team take on a modern day fast Ford to see if a quick flip could make a few quid and revisit a 3 year MG restoration project thats still not finished.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 90s Alfa with electrical issues lives up to its stereotype and the team revisit a road roller, four years on. They also tackle a French motoring icon, the Citroen 2CV6 Dolly.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear how an assassination brought conflict to Europe in 1914.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team make a second visit to Port Sunlight on the Wirral as visitors dig out more family treasures. Among the items brought before the experts are a stash of rare and valuable advertising signs found on a tip, a religious painting with a tantalising question of fake or fortune, and part of an Apollo spaceship given to a young boy in the 1960s.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries
programme.desc: Robbies narrowboat gets stuck under a low bridge on the challenging Basingstoke Canal as he battles through water weed. Can he make it to journeys end?

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson explores the legendary Trail of the Eagles Nest, a stunning 100-mile route connecting a group of medieval castles perched across the limestone highlands.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon travels from Darwin in Australias Northern Territory or `Top End, across to the remote Cape York Peninsula, and on to the Great Barrier Reef. Simon sets off from Kakadu, the largest national park in the world, where the wildlife is under threat from the march of millions of poisonous cane toads. He joins a team of toad-busters catching the amphibian invaders.

programme.desc: The team take on a modern day fast Ford to see if a quick flip could make a few quid and revisit a 3 year MG restoration project thats still not finished.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A little-known dark past explains the vast monolithic structures that dominate the small British island of Guernsey.

programme.title: Canal Boat Diaries

programme.title: Paras
programme.desc: Dharam Singh is a honest farmer in rural India and lives with his sister Bela. One day both siblings witness a murder and drag the murderer down to the police station. However, what they do not realise is that the murderer is the brother of the influential Arjun Singh and that their decision to turn him in will change everything.

programme.title: Alif
programme.desc: Hakim wants his 10-year-old son Ali to become a doctor. However, he faces backlash from his family and neighbours who want Ali to become a scholar of Quran. Things change after Hakims sister arrives.

programme.title: Ishwar Sakshi
programme.desc: A man promises to marry his daughter to a young man in front of a statue of Vishnu as his witness. Later the father refuses and the young man appeals to Vishnu for help.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: A prim and proper fashion designer is attracted to an impulsive man after running into him on a highway.

programme.title: Lamhe
programme.desc: Viren falls in love at first sight when he sees the beautiful Pallavi, but is too shy to let her know his feelings. He then realises she is in love with Siddharth, whom she goes on to marry. When Pallavi and Siddharth die in a car crash, Viren takes charge of their daughter Pooja. As the years pass, Viren and Pooja fall in love, but Viren is not prepared to accept his feelings for a girl so much younger than himself.

programme.title: Mujhse Shaadi Karogi
programme.desc: Sameer is a quick-tempered young man who is shipped off to Goa after losing his temper and getting kicked out of school. There he falls in love with Rani, but she is in love with someone else. To make matters worse, he has offended Ranis father, the disagreeable Colonel Dugraj Singh. Is there any way this romance can end happily?

programme.title: Fighter
programme.desc: Shamsher Pathania fulfils his lifelong dream and becomes a member of the Indian air force. As he faces rigorous challenges, Patty must rise above his own limitations to become a true hero.

programme.title: Fateh
programme.desc: A former gangster must protect a young woman from a gang of thugs.

programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.
